sentences: Martyn Craig Campbell (born 1970 in Liverpool) is an English bass player.
He is best known for his work with Rain, The Lightning Seeds, Richard Ashcroft, Wah! and Terry Hall.
Campbell has also worked with Pete Wylie, and toured with Shack.
Arthur Lee & Shack - Live in Liverpool (2000)
Mike Badger - Lo Fi Acoustic Excursions (2004)
Richard Ashcroft - Keys to the World (2006)
